name: aws-lambda-konexio
description: Le code source AWS Lambda et Airtable Sripts de Konexio.

scripts.zip:layer: mkdir nodejs && npm prune --production && cp -R node_modules/ nodejs/ && cp package.json nodejs/package.json && cp package-lock.json nodejs/package-lock.json && npm install --only=dev && lambda-zip .lambda-zip/layer.lambda-zip layer.zip -a -v
scripts.deploy:layer: npm run zip:layer && npm run update:layer
scripts.deploy:sms: npm run zip:sms && npm run update:sms
scripts.deploy:scheduled15: npm run zip:scheduled15 && npm run update:scheduled15
